name: Open Sorcery
description: BEL/S is an Elemental Firewall: a fire elemental bound with C++ code to protect a network of people and places. She can learn things, develop relationships, and even gain sapience. Or she can burn everything with fire. It's up to you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: N/A Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: N/A
